title: Pretty Little Liars: The Perfectionists
summary: Pretty Little Liars: The Perfectionists is an American crime thriller mystery drama television series created by I. Marlene King. The series is a sequel to Pretty Little Liars and was loosely based on the 2014 novel The Perfectionists by Sara Shepard. The show premiered on Freeform on March 20, 2019 and concluded on May 22, 2019.
